Veritcal Farming.name: Veritcal Farming
Veritcal Farming.missionStatement: Develop the capability to sustainably grow and deliver food to everyone

possibleSolutions: Modular design so farms can start small and grow as needed
Self-sustaining unit so farms can operate in remote areas off-grid

difficulties.description: Limited number of crops can be grown economically and grown crops have small caloric density
possibleSolutions: Platform and infrastructure for sharing recipes (recipes are lighting, fertilizer, growth medium, seed, etc combinations)
Develop marketplace for incentivising recipe creation

difficulties.description: High dependence on technology working correctly - very exposed to power outages
possibleSolutions: Modular design so farms can start small and grow as needed
Self-sustaining unit so farms can operate in remote areas off-grid
Automated drone swarm for delivery enabled alongside GPS connected trackers similar to airtags
Accessible collection sites for people without homes and do not want GPS tracking
Farms that can float on the ocean
Farms that can orbit the earth in space
